title: ConvertXtoDVD 6.0.0.64 + Crack
description:
Creating DVD's is quite a common undertaking nowaday's and perhaps this is why are loads of applications designed to help users in this respect. One of the more popular utilities of this kind is ConvertXtoDVD from VSO Software SARL, and as it's name suggests, it can converts video's to DVD format.



The software is easy to use and it comes with an easy to use interface that makes all the fuctions avalaible with one or two clicks with your mouse and it is not cluttered by may buttons, tabs or menu's. A great thing about this handy tool is that it supports not only DVD'S but also Blu-Ray Disc's for both input and output.



With ConvertXtoDVD you can edit the audio streams, subtitles and disc chapters as well. If you want to check out the modifications of the work in progress, yoy can use the preview window on the right side of the main window.



There are many templates you can choose from and make the DVD more modern or more classic just as easy. More detailed settings allow you to configure the root menu parameters, including background audio, video or image, the chapter menu and many more.



When it comes to the supported file types and sources, ConvertXtoDVD offwers a variety of options. It can handle AVI, DivX, MPEG4, MOV, DV, WMV and WMV HD while the input can come from digital video camera's, capture cards, TV or satellite.



In case you don't want to burn the data on disc, there's always the possibility to save the DVD structure to a folder of you own choose on your hard drive or make an ISO image. ConvertXtoDVD can create disc's in both PAL and NTSC region formats, so the compatibility is ensurd for all DVD players out there.



All in all, the application is indeed one that deserves at least a try. Thanks to a solid feature pack, easy to use and quick in proccesing, ConvertXtoDVD remains one of the best choices in it's category.



This torrent contains the following:



- ConvertXtoDVD 6.0.0.64
- Crack
- Install Notes



Don't hit and run. A minimum seed time required, the maximum seed time desired. Please seed for as long as you are able to keep this torrent alive!
